description: Manages a Data Factory Azure-SSIS Integration Runtime.

AdministratorLogin.description: Administrator login name for the SQL Server.

AdministratorPassword.description: Administrator login password for the SQL Server.

PricingTier.description: Pricing tier for the database that will be created for the SSIS catalog. Valid values are: `Basic`, `Standard`, `Premium` and `PremiumRS`.

ServerEndpoint.description: The endpoint of an Azure SQL Server that will be used to host the SSIS catalog.

BlobContainerUri.description: The blob endpoint for the container which contains a custom setup script that will be run on every node on startup. See [https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/data-factory/how-to-configure-azure-ssis-ir-custom-setup](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/data-factory/how-to-configure-azure-ssis-ir-custom-setup) for more information.

SasToken.description: A container SAS token that gives access to the files. See [https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/data-factory/how-to-configure-azure-ssis-ir-custom-setup](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/data-factory/how-to-configure-azure-ssis-ir-custom-setup) for more information.

SubnetName.description: Name of the subnet to which the nodes of the Azure-SSIS Integration Runtime will be added.

VnetId.description: ID of the virtual network to which the nodes of the Azure-SSIS Integration Runtime will be added.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

DataFactoryName.description: Specifies the name of the Data Factory the Azure-SSIS Integration Runtime belongs to. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Edition.description: The Azure-SSIS Integration Runtime edition. Valid values are `Standard` and `Enterprise`. Defaults to `Standard`.

LicenseType.description: The type of the license that is used. Valid values are `LicenseIncluded` and `BasePrice`. Defaults to `LicenseIncluded`.

Location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

MaxParallelExecutionsPerNode.description: Defines the maximum parallel executions per node. Defaults to `1`. Max is `16`.

Name.description: Specifies the name of the Azure-SSIS Integration Runtime. Changing this forces a new resource to be created. Must be globally unique. See the [Microsoft documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/data-factory/naming-rules) for all restrictions.

NodeSize.description: The size of the nodes on which the Azure-SSIS Integration Runtime runs. Valid values are: `Standard_D2_v3`, `Standard_D4_v3`, `Standard_D8_v3`, `Standard_D16_v3`, `Standard_D32_v3`, `Standard_D64_v3`, `Standard_E2_v3`, `Standard_E4_v3`, `Standard_E8_v3`, `Standard_E16_v3`, `Standard_E32_v3`, `Standard_E64_v3`, `Standard_D1_v2`, `Standard_D2_v2`, `Standard_D3_v2`, `Standard_D4_v2`, `Standard_A4_v2` and `Standard_A8_v2`.

NumberOfNodes.description: Number of nodes for the Azure-SSIS Integration Runtime. Max is `10`. Defaults to `1`.

ResourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Azure-SSIS Integration Runtime. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
